SELECT CASE WHEN substring(chat_num,1,6) = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%y%m%d') THEN CONCAT(substring(chat_num,1,6),LPAD(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(chat_num,7,4), SIGNED INTEGER) + 1,4,'0')) ELSE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%y%m%d'),'0001') END as chat_num from (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(chat_num),DATE_FORMAT(DATE(sysdate()),'%y%m%d')) as chat_num FROM chat) a
insert into chat(chat_num,chat_gen_dttm,help_num,cnsr_num,suppl_num) values (#{chatNum}, #{chatGenDttm}, #{helpNum}, #{cnsrNum}, #{supplNum})
